ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Just for fun
ygData.msgSnippet: Cool! Too bad it s not as easy to wipe out Unrest at my lvl. But soon I hope to get high enough lvl to own it. luv, -Su hehe that s always fun to do...my
ygData.messageBody:
Cool! Too bad it's not as easy to wipe out Unrest at my lvl. But soon I hope
to get high enough lvl to own it.
luv,
-Su

hehe that's always fun to do...my wizzie (23) stopped an entire Swarm in NK
with a couple of AOE's...the kiddies sure loved that...or Thyla's trick of
completely clearing the Gnoll camp at Rathe, the entire Aviak city, Paw back
to the doors, or CB's throne room for them to get corpses.
----- Original Message -----
From: Su
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, July 27, 2001 10:25 PM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Just for fun


Speaking of fun, my brother (lvl 27 Paladin), my guildmate (lvl 20 warr)
and
myself (lvl 29 cleric) owned Crushbone yesterday. We went in and killed
every single orc just for fun. There was nobody else there so we owned the
place. It was great!
luv,
-Su

> I have managed to get my ranger 14 levels without getting killed and
> my druid all the way from 1 to 21 before getting snuffed.
>
> My rogue on the other hand... oi!
>
> Sweetwood Runebow 30 Ranger
> Clancie Rocport 39 Druid
> Clan of the Roc-Bristlebane
>
> --- In EverQuest@y..., kwarden@p... wrote:
> > Since it has been quiet I was just wondering how many levels others
> > have gone without dying.
> >
> > p.s. without being twinked,buffed or power leveled.
>
>
